alert.note: Alert for Admiralty Island; Annette Island; Cape Fairweather to Lisianski Strait; City and Borough of Juneau; City and Borough of Sitka; City and Borough of Wrangell; City and Borough of Yakutat; City of Hyder; Eastern Chichagof Island; Glacier Bay; Haines Borough and Klukwan; Ketchikan Gateway Borough; Municipality of Skagway; Petersburg Borough; Prince of Wales Island; Western Kupreanof and Kuiu Island (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued November 20 at 9:50AM AKST by NWS Juneau
info.description: ...STRONG WINDS AND HEAVY RAIN FOR SUNDAY NIGHT THROUGH MONDAY... Strong wind gusts up to 55 mph and periods of heavy rain with total amounts as high as 2 inches are expected. The strongest winds and highest rainfall totals will be along the outer gulf coast and the southern panhandle as a developing low moves up along the NE Gulf Coast. This will increase the risk of impacts across SE Alaska before the low makes landfall near Yakutat. A developing front associated with the low will bring the highest wind gusts and the greatest rainfall rates beginning during the early morning period on Monday and lasting through the day before conditions begin to improve through Monday night. Another strong system will arrive in the area Wednesday and Thursday bringing more impactful weather.
